skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Kiyonami, the eighth Yuugumo-class destroyer... I had improved anti-air capabilities, but neither Yuugure nor I could really deal with things in the air... Ugh... If only I'd done a better job back then... B-but even so, I did achieve a couple of things! Wh-what I'm getting at is that I'll do the best job I can...!
skins.acquisition: Yuugumo-class destroyer Kiyonami, r-reporting for duty... And this is my friend, Hoppy... I-it's nice to meet you! ... Ugh...
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander... Come on, Hoppy, say hi to the Commander.
skins.details: Ugh... C-could you please not stare so much...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I feel safe around Yuugure. I enjoy playing and having sleepovers with her. I wish I had more friends like her...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Oh no, a-another air raid?! ... Commander, please don't scare me like that!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm always doing my best, trying to catch up to everyone... S-so please, don't ever leave me behind, okay...?
skins.secretaryTouch: Hoppy is cute, isn't he? Ehehe~ He's always there with me when I go to bed.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I-I'm not sure why you're doing this... B-but please stop, it tickles, Commander...!

skins.shipDescription: S-sorry to keep you waiting... Yuugure and I picked out this outfit together. She said it "looked very Christmassy," but it doesn't look weird, right? ... Ugh...
skins.acquisition: S-sorry to keep you waiting... Yuugure and I picked out this outfit together. She said it "looked very Christmassy," but it doesn't look weird, right? ... Ugh...
skins.login: M-Merry Christmas, Commander! Phew... I think I said that right!
skins.details: I'm not sure what wrapping paper to use for my presents... Ummhh... Could you help me pick out a good one, Commander...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm spending Christmas with Yuugure and some friends. D-do you want to be there with us too, Commander...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I've gotten presents for everyone I know. Th-that includes you, of course, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle3: All these warm lights at Christmas make me feel at ease... I wish it was Christmas all year round...
skins.secretaryTouch: Sometimes... Hoppy is on his own, but we always go to bed together at night.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Y-you'll make my hood come undone... Ugh...
